DOC.brief_summary: Ketorolac non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug ( NSAID ) , similar ibuprofen use treat severe pain . Ketorolac ( Trade name : Toradol ) typically used surgical procedure . When take orally , cause sedation . The purpose study determine oral ketorolac effective reduce pain IUD placement versus placebo tablet .
DOC.brief_title: Oral Ketorolac Pain Relief During IUD Insertion
DOC.detailed_description: In United States , 10 % woman choose intrauterine device ( IUD ) contraception . With typical use , unintended pregnancy rate first year IUD contraception 0.8 % ( Copper T ) 0.2 % ( LNG ) . It known long-acting , reversible contraception method reduce long-term cost unintended pregnancy . A common deterrent intrauterine contraception fear pain placement . Methods pain relief IUD insertion must fast-acting minimal sedation . There many attempt find effective pain relief IUD placement . Neither ibuprofen naproxen show effective reduce pain . Misoprostol use increase cervical ripening ; however , pain decrease , side effect nausea vomit increase . Ketorolac nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug ( NSAID ) work reversibly inhibit cyclooxygenase-1 2.Time peak plasma concentration ketorolac oral form 44 minute . Studies show one dose ketorolac potent morphine . Ketorolac also well establish pain control immediate post-operative period . A recent study show intramuscular ketorolac wais effective reduce pain IUD insertion , 20 % participant report procedure , injection site painful IUD placement . The current study design evaluate reduce pain IUD placement use oral ketorolac 40-60 minute procedure compare placebo .
